item.rel_title: Monitoring Disease Transmissibility of 2019 Novel Coronavirus Disease in Zhejiang, China
item.rel_abs: We monitored the transmissibility of 2019 novel coronavirus disease in Zhejiang accounting the transmissions from imported cases. Even though Zhejiang is one of the worst-affected provinces, an interruption of disease transmission (i.e. instantaneous reproduction numbers <1) was observed in early/mid-February after an early social-distancing response to the outbreak.
item.rel_authors: Chong, K. C.; Cheng, W.; Zhao, S.; Ling, F.; Mohammad, K. N.; Wang, M. H.; Zee, B. C.-y.; Wei, L.; Xiong, X.; Liu, H.; Wang, J.; Chen, E.
